name: Mad Dog McCree
overview: Mad Dog McCree and his band of cutthroats have ridden into town, kidnapped the Mayor and his daughter, and taken them to his hideout. These hombres are mean and vicious. What this town needs is a gunslinger to spray a little lead in harm's way. Relive the gunpowder glory of the Wild West with American Laser Games Arcade Classic Mad Dog McCree! Features • Only one gunslinger can stop Mad Dog! • Holster your iron and get ready to draw. • An American Laser Games Arcade Classic.
